entries.title: The Shivah had an awesomely rabbinical take on Monkey Island's insult sword-fighting
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: How much time do you spend on MMO character fashion?

entries.title: Founding member of Disco Elysium studio claims core devs 'involuntarily' left the company

entries.title: Tesla unveils bipedal robot that is not a guy in a morph suit
entries.description: The prototype that could walk around without support was kind of neat.

entries.title: This cool Metal Gear Solid throwback trades rocket launchers for sponge bullets
entries.description: Undetected is the most 1998 game of 2022.
